dialogues.text: In a series of BLACK AND WHITE STILLS we see ALEX, the 40 massive dude we saw in the background on VERONA's tape, exiting a taxi and walking into CHARLIE O'S - a big New Y style 40's-era steak and cocktail joint right in the hear

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: downtown L.A.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Interesting. Downtown Charlie O's?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.    I was just down here getting a taco.    He went right in, like, 2 minutes ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm across the street, getting a taco. Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV hits the gas pedal and blasts off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm there.     Meet me on 3rd and Flower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In fast motion we see the freeway exits flash by, one aft another.

dialogues.text: 3 KAYLO pays for his food at a leisurely pace - he's at a little place across the street from CHARLIE O'S - and sku out onto the street, trying too hard to be inconspicuous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 45 Meanwhile, in the second screen, CHEV is blasting along a high speed, off the freeway, through downtown, and right the corner of 3rd and Flower, where he leaves the taxi id in a red zone and gets out.

dialogues.text: As KAYLO turns the corner, the two SPLIT SCREENS meet up 45 and CHEV run right into each other.

dialogues.text: motioning to the restaurant) He's in there now?

dialogues.text: KAYLO nods quickly, freaked out.

dialogues.text: KAYLO shakes his head NO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lright, wait here.

dialogues.text: 46 ALEX is in his usual booth, making lecherous smalltalk wi 40ish WAITRESS in a short skirt and fishnet stockings, as CHEV, still drying, hair all fucked up and walking erratically, enters the restaurant. Everyone turns to loo at the crazy man, nervously.

dialogues.text: I just saw a ghost.

dialogues.text: He passes a butcher block, a hacked up roast, a conspicuo BUTCHER KNIFE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turning a corner, he notices the back door swinging slowl closed. He advances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: efore ALEX can react, CHEV lets swing with the knife and neatly cuts off ALEX'S gun hand at the wrist. The hand, g and all, hits the ground. CHEV kicks ALEX out the door an into the alley.

dialogues.text: 48 ALEX crumples in shock, holding his abbreviated arm out i front of his face. He tries to talk, or scream, but all t comes out is a wheezing sound. CHEV follows him out into alley, brandishing the BUTCHER KNIFE, heartrate slamming.

dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) Jesus ... nothing's easy ...

dialogues.text: He pries the gun from ALEX'S cold, dead fingers, shoves i his pocket and tosses the hand to a disgusted KAYLO, who tries to get away from it ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You -

dialogues.text: Out.

dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.text: P

dialogues.text: hey reach CHEV'S room. The door is slightly ajar.     One the cops pushes it open with his foot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.   You.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He exits into the ...

dialogues.text: Suddenly the entrance doors BURST OPEN ... a patient is wheeled in at a dead run by a small group of emergency TE all shouting instructions back and forth and barking at people to get out of the way as they race toward the far corridor. The FAT MAN on the gurney has his shirt open .. he's pale, glassy eyed and lathered in sweat ... they hav the DEFIBRILLATOR PADDLES out ...

dialogues.text: ehind the gurney a RESIDENT pushes a CRASH CART along wit them ... the crash cart houses the DEFIBRILLATOR and vari supplies ...

dialogues.text: I know you motherfuckers have epinephrine!

dialogues.text: The COPS bang open the stairwell door, guns drawn. breaks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: CHEV What?

dialogues.text: FAT MAN Asshole...!

dialogues.text: CHEV Yeah, yeah.

dialogues.text: TECH 2 hat is this? What the hell do you think you're doing? THIS IS A HOSPITAL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV

dialogues.text: F

dialogues.text: CHEV brandishes the gun toward the COPS to keep them on t ground, then motions C the RESIDENT. to

dialogues.text: HEV (CONT'D) You.   Get me some ... I need ...

dialogues.text: CHEV

dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) Give me that.

dialogues.text: AT MAN ... asshole...

dialogues.text: A GUY standing next to CHEV glances sidelong at him. CHEV turns to meet his eyes. The GUY regards him in a stupor, then looks down: CHEV's hospital johnnie is sticking stra out in front, ass hanging out the back, a gun in his left hand, cell phone in his right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he GUY looks back up at CHEV'S poker face, gulps, and tur back to the wall of screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The broadcast cuts from tape back to the live ANCHOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANCHOR (CONT'D) We want to get you back to our regularly scheduled programming, but keep it tuned right here to ABC for continuing coverage of this bizarre story as it unfolds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANNOUNCER (V.O.) (over network graphic) We now return you to "Dr. Phil" ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TV cuts to a talk show in progress. Rather than disperse, the small crowd stays hypnotically glued to the tube. We see in their eyes that everyone is going into th TV alpha state thing ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV shakes his head, snaps out of it. His HEARTBEAT, bar audible during the broadcast, swells back to full volume, beating like a jackrabbit's.

dialogues.speaker: H
dialogues.text: e looks around and spots a COP on a motorcycle, waiting a stoplight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 With a last look at the TV drones he breaks from the crow and goes into stealth mode, darting from car to car in an exaggerated ninja crouch, trying to sneak up on the COP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes up behind him, transfers his gun and cell phone one hand, and - heart POUNDING - reaches stealthily for t COP'S holster with the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAR HORNS BLARE as motorists attempt to warn the COP, who flinches and whips around at the noise - but it's too lat CHEV has the gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He begins to hop around maniacally, taunting the COP, as everyone panics and tries to reverse out of the traffic snarl, SLAMMING INTO FENDERS, driving up onto the sidewal etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tossing the gun up and catching it) You want it? You want this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he COP jumps off the bike and tries to make a go at him, jerks back when CHEV catches the gun. CHEV holds the gun like a fetch stick, gluing the COP'S eyes, then flings it feet through the air to splash into a plaza fountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he COP starts after it, then stops short as he sees CHEV dart past him and hop onto his still idling motorcycle. H kicks up the stand and REVS IT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You son of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COP makes a dive for CHEV, grabbing him by the waist the bike jerks forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV starts to burn the bike out as the COP hangs on, dragging. SMOKE ERUPTS; black bits of rubber spray like buckshot, pelting the COP. CHEV does a 360 DEGREE BURNOUT kicking with his leg to keep the bike under control, then jerking, skidding, BLASTS OFF. The COP hangs on, cursing, dragging, boots smoking, for a half block before he bails out.
EVERYBODY'S TALKING" by Harry Nilsson BEGINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV cruises in an out of traffic and people like a Sunda drive, ignoring traffic lights, stop signs, pedestrians. speed ramp about 20% to the beat of the song - an undercr of about 18fps.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's so jacked up and delusional he decides to try a BARE ASSED "ELEVATOR" ON THE SIDEWALK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the rear pegs at about 30 mph he JUMPS UP TO THE GAS TANK, feet first, STANDS STRAIGHT UP ON THE MOVING BIKE a puts his hands out to his sides in a Jesus Christ pose, flashing a silhouette in the sun. His HEART POUNDS as he flies by crowds of astonished bystanders ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .. and CRASHES straight into a patio restaurant full of people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV flips through the air and lands in a cacophony of overturned tables and busted dishes. A table spins like a coin at his feet.

dialogues.speaker: EXT RESTAURANT, MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: 9 Stunned silence hangs in the air; a few food-covered peop wander around in dazed shock. CHEV'S arm, hand still clutching his cell phone, sticks out from under a table. phone starts to ring:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From under the table we see CHEV'S eyes blink as he comes his senses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes off the debris, struggles to his feet and click answer the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sleepy) Hey. Did you try to call?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV lets his arm drop to his side, stares blankly at nothing, then brings it back up.

dialogues.speaker: INT EVE'S APARTMENT, SAME TIME
dialogues.text: 70 A room suffused in amber filtered sunlight. EVE, a non- traditionally adorable strawberry blond in her mid 20's, stretches with the phone cradled between ear and bare shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been home all day?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was sleeping in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were sleeping in, that's great, Eve ... super great ... you all rested now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holding it together) Well, I'm glad to hear that. Listen, I've been fatally poisoned, there's probably a psychopath heading over there to torture and kill you as we speak, but don't bother getting out of bed, I'll be there in a flash ... Maybe you could fry me up a waffle or something, kay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (oblivious) Sure, come on over, I'll be here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, you'll be there, OK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV clicks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ll the while he's been wrestling the wasted motorcycle fr the wreckage. It's smoking, leaking oil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes his head at a dumfounded waiter, holding up the phone like - "Can you believe this?" ... then climbs on t SPUTTERING BIKE and drives off.

dialogues.text: 71 CU: VERONA stares straight down at the CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVERSE: VERONA'S POV - ALEX'S severed hand, frozen stiff a trigger-pulling position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA looks up at his CREW, gathered nervously around th room; lunatic schizo-cycles through a half dozen emotions before arriving at something resembling off-hand, casual, I'll have the #2 Super Size with a Diet Coke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, so... let's go get the bitch.

dialogues.speaker: INT EVE'S APARTMENT, 4 MINUTES LATER
dialogues.text: 72 EVE'S pad is nothing like CHEV'S. It's all cats and incen warm natural light, a scratchy Van Morrison LP playing on real record player.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VE, in a cotton nightgown, is in the kitchen, attempting some bit of microwave programming, punching random button and getting herself worked up. E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the microwave) I hate you ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five BANGS on the door barely distract her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More BANGS, insistent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, alright, Jesus ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gives up on the microwave, goes to answer the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... calm down, what the hell ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's CHEV. He's dressed in a blue Adidas JOGGING SUIT - l sleeve jacket, warm up pants with buttons down the side, works. He couldn't look more out of place in EVE'S mellow apartment. He's bathed in sweat, wild-eyed, hair slicked back like GORDON GEKKO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.   My.   God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey doll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls her toward him and kisses her. She accepts the k gratefully enough with her mouth, but holds both hands ou her sides as if touching the JOGGING SUIT would kill her.

dialogues.text: Without making eye contact, he breaks away and pushes int the apartment, looking around everywhere, paranoid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Is this your new look or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV That's right. You into it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE It's ... completely appalling.    Very you, Chev.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He checks into the bedroom, satisfies himself that it's empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Are you looking for my other boyfriend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (ignoring this) You haven't turned on the TV today, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE No.   Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Didn't think so.    Listen, we've got to get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE What are you talking about?    Don't be such a freak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV goes to the window, peaks through the curtains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (CONT'D) Actually, I'm glad you're here. Can you change the clock on the microwave?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE I never changed it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV The microwave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Yeah. I never changed it back.   You know, daylight savings time. C HEV I bought you some flowers, but they got fucked up on the way over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE That's sweet. Are you OK? You look like you're on drugs or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV You love me, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Then I need you to do something for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE What is it? What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I need you to put some clothes on and come with me right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE But ... I ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I'll change the clock on the microwave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confused, she pads off to the bedroom to change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV goes into the kitchen. He peeks out the kitchen wind looks around nervously, glances at the microwave, walks u and punches two buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXTREME CU: in ULTRA SLO-MOTION the digital readout on th clock switches from 11 to NOON with a sound like an 18- wheeler being dragged on it's side through a cathedral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV'S vision starts to blur. He slumps forward, head pressed against the microwave, trying to hold himself up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear his HEART skip, hang for a long moment, then thud again, heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV (to himself) That shit's wearing off ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (O.S.) (calling to him) Oh darn! I forgot, the waffle iron's on if you want to make one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (calling back) Great, great ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lurches over to the other side of the kitchen ... wher old fashioned-style waffle iron sits, plugged in and star to smoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a deep breath, opens the lid, PUTS HIS HAND IN A PRESSES THE THING CLOSED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OUND: a stomach churning SEAR AND SIZZLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e screams under his breath, stomping on the kitchen floor agony ... but his HEARTBEAT rockets up again. He pulls ou his pink, smoking hand and jams it under his armpit, hopp up and down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (O.S.) You're so stressed out, do you want some pot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (fighting to get the words out) Yes. No! ... thanks ...

dialogues.text: The waffle iron starts to SPARK from the plug. He yanks i out of the wall as EVE walks in wearing a sun dress and a ribbon in her hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (holding it in) Nothing ... burned my hand ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She comes up to him, tries to pry his hand out from under arm.                 E VE Oh my God, are you OK?   Let me see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV It's nothing... don't worry about it... let's get out of here ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Come on, let me see ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (coldly) That was just totally uncalled for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (exasperated) I'm sorry ... look, can we just ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns, grabs her purse and walks out the front door i huff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV is about to follow her when he notices something out window - DOUBLE TAKES, then parts the blinds to get a bet look.

dialogues.text: A SEDAN has pulled up outside. TWO HOODS hop out and spli 73 up, one coming up the front way, the other around back. E one has a right hand tucked into his blazer - they're PACKING.

dialogues.text: CHEV (under his breath) Shit!

dialogues.text: He flies out the door after EVE - the door swings shut be him.

dialogues.text: 74 CHEV comes up behind EVE, grabs her by the shoulders and turns her around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I'm parked out back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He glances over his shoulder. Through the glass SECURITY he sees HOOD #1 coming up the front steps.

dialogues.text: EVE stops suddenly in front of her door - CHEV practicall PILES into her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh darn... the thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thing.     What thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (unlocking the door) The waffle thing. I forgot to turn it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he opens the door and walks in. CHEV tries to speak, coug up some unintelligible stacato nonsense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: 6 CHEV is SLACK-JAWED. Inside the apartment, the PHONE BEGI TO RING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, alright...!

dialogues.text: CHEV shakes his head in disbelief; steels himself - then turns and walks quickly down the hall to the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OO LATE. CHEV'S hand flashes forward, PALM connecting wit the BRIDGE OF THE NOSE - dropping him instantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VE I hate that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV You trying to burn down the building?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) Whoa whoa whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 80 he building opens out back into a small parking area. Tra bins line the brick wall, ready for pick up. CHEV and EVE leaving when CHEV sees the other HOOD coming around the corner, LESS THAN TEN FEET AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV grabs the back of EVE'S purse and turns it upside do spilling the contents all over the concrete. She spins around, just missing C sight of the HOOD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV Aww, damn it, I'm sorry baby...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (irritated) Nice one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She drops down to gather up her things, as the HOOD comes fully around the corner and MEETS EYES with CHEV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ithout hesitation, CHEV hurdles EVE and catches the HOOD' wrist as he pulls out his GUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (oblivious) I swear to God, Chev, I don't know what you're on these days but it is not working for you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV wrestles himself around the HOOD, keeping the gun at distance with one hand, his other hand cupped over the HO mouth, head-locking him. Their legs interlock, jostling f leverage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he GUN drifts down toward EVE - CHEV wrenches it up as TH TRIGGER SQUEEZES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SILENCER. The shot whizzes over EVE'S head and through a nearby window: PLINK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 81 A PARAKEET in a cage by the window disappears in a puff o feathers. 8

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From overhead, the CAMERA CORKSCREWS CLOCKWISE as CHEV wrenches the HOOD'S neck COUNTERCLOCKWISE, snapping it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I could use a little help here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV shoves the HOOD'S body into a dumpster just as EVE turns... CHEV snatches up the first thing he sees - a gri encrusted plastic SHOWER CAP - and holds it up lamely.

dialogues.text: Is this yours?

dialogues.text: EVE rolls her eyes, looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's your car?

dialogues.text: My car. Actually... I took a cab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: lames start to SHOOT UP from the motorcycle; THE CROWD SCATTERS, ducking for cover.

dialogues.text: 4 MONTAGE: Chinatown is bustling with activity. Vendors hag ... workers hustle down the sidewalk with baskets of chickens, sides of meat ... tourists wander ... motorists argue and punch their horns ... and the lunch hour crowd converges on a hundred eateries ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e hear a million HEARTBEATS, old, young ... even fast ticking chicken heartbeats, all overlapping, blending together in a swelling din of live things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The voyeuristic CAMERA picks CHEV and EVE up through the crowd. CHEV is wearing DARK GLASSES to go with his 80's h E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: and jogger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're embarrassing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I didn't have a lot of time to pick this out ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hm.   So why are we here?

dialogues.speaker: INT NOODLE HOUSE, MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: 85 CHEV sits across from EVE in a tiny restaurant. An equall tiny VIETNAMESE WOMAN brings them menus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV pulls a little bottle of NAS-ALL out of his pocket a SNORTS the entire thing, grotesquely, at the table. It doesn't help much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shakes out his head, bangs his fist on the table and s up in his chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holding his fingers up to indicate quotation marks)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: "This isn't going to be easy" ... as they say ...

dialogues.text: EVE flinches at the sight of his burned, waffle patterned palm. He notices, draws it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) Alright, here it is. I told you I was a video game programmer. That was a lie. Actually...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV'S DIALOG continues over the FLASHBACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV is retrieving a HIDDEN GUN from the kitchen, checkin the CLIP, the BARREL, the ACTION, and slipping out a side door into a RED CORRIDOR past two CHINESE MEN in black su

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (V.O.) I kill people. I'm a professional hitman. I freelance for a major West Coast crime syndicate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM sits at the head of the table, drinking alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (V.O.) Last night was a job like a hundred others. A high dollar hit. Nothing special.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV walks up behind him, gun drawn to the back of KIM'S head... cocks the hammer back. DON KIM spins around in sh the same reaction we saw in the SCENE 1 FLASHBACK - FROZE SAUCER-EYED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV'S eyes steel... his finger tightens...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV (V.O.) (CONT'D) And then out of nowhere this insane idea comes in through the back of my head like a .45 slug at close range...

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: ilence hangs heavy in the room... CHEV holds the gun to D KIM'S head, paralyzed with indecision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM Well? What are you waiting for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a last GRIMACE like even he can't believe what he's doing, CHEV lets his GUN HAND DROP slowly to his side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV Congratulations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM Did I win something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Your life, jackass. (beat) A hundred grand wants you dead, so sooner or later it's going to happen. But I'm not doing it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM I see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV nstead, you're going to do something for me. You're going to get out of town. Disappear. I don't care where you go, I don't care what you do, so long as you're invisible for 48 hours. That's all I ask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM (incredulous) 48 hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Or if you prefer, we can do it the other way, the way where I go to work and you go meet Buddah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV leans back in his chair and slams one of the legs do onto his foot. EVE flinches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV See: I quit. I quit the business. For you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE For me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV figure I call you that night. I tell you everything. You understand. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: We get on a plane together and leave all this shit behind. Never come back. shrugs) Pretty crazy, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are so weird. Are we going on a trip?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV stares at her blankly, then shakes his head to clear

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, well... I may be going on a trip, but you're not coming with me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand.

dialogues.speaker: EXT CHINATOWN, OUTDOOR PLAZA, MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: 86 EVE storms out of the restaurant, letting the door slam behind her. CHEV follows, staggering like a drunk man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He catches up to her and grabs her arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve... baby... please!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spins on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mob hits, Chev? Chinese poison? Do you know how ridiculous you sound? If you're going to break up with me, at least you can tell me the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think it sounds crazy? How do you think I feel - I've gotta live this shit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ust then the CAMERA SLAMS THROUGH CHEV'S TRANSPARENT CHES his HEART seems to GRIND DOWN and STALL, MID-PUMP, as the POISON'S PROGRESS moves another clock tick forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he CAMERA pulls violently out of CHEV'S chest cavity - he looks like someone just FIRED A CANNONBALL INTO HIS GUT.. face white as a dinner plate... It's the worst we've seen yet.

dialogues.text: CHEV here's the keys?

dialogues.speaker: E
dialogues.text: VE holds out her hand, where she's had them all along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) (taking them) Cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE My stuff...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks like she's about to wander around, gathering up things, when another volley of shots BLOWS OUT THE PASSEN WINDOW of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV picks EVE up like a sack of grain and THROWS HER, HE FIRST, THROUGH THE PASSENGER WINDOW, INTO THE CAR, then r around the other side, hops in and PEELS OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE gets herself turned upright and stares at CHEV, hair of windshield glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE You weren't lying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Welcome to my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (head over heels IN LOVE) No, I mean: that you were going to give it all up for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Oh. Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE And the other part?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV The poison? Yeah, that's true too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e SLAMS his fist against the wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (cracking) Then... that means...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Pretty much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE How can we stop it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Adrenaline. It's the only thing that slows it down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VE (getting it) So... when we were in Chinatown...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Yeah. Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LOOK OF DETERMINATION comes over her. She reaches for h crotch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE his will get you going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Come on, let's finish what you started.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV'S eyes flash to the rearview mirror and GO WIDE. He grabs the back of EVE'S head and PUSHES IT DOWN INTO HIS just as a BULLET SLICES THROUGH THE REAR WINDSHIELD and o the front.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE'S head STAYS DOWN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Oh boy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV is straining against the seat, EVASIVE DRIVING as sh GOES DOWN on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) Oh yeah, that's... that's really working for me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE'S head pops up. E

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VE (working him up) You like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shots whiz by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Stay down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes her head back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV'S heart is POUNDING like a jackhammer. He's got hims arched into a crazy position, making it happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) That's it that's it that's it... just a little...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE'S head quickly pops back up. She PUSHES AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) (flustered) What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VE (satisfied) So you can fall asleep like you always do? I don't think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV loses his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He SLAMS THE BRAKES to put the car into a SLIDE, exposing driver side to the pursuing sedan - punches his gun hand the window and BLASTS AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He NAILS THE DRIVER BETWEEN THE EYES... the window DISINTEGRATES... The SEDAN full of HOODS skids into the sidewalk. Steam pours from the radiator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV gets out and walks DIRECTLY UP TO THE SEDAN, one han holding his gun straight out in front of him, the other PULLING UP HIS JOGGING PANTS, which are bunched up around knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV unloads the entire clip into the SEDAN before any of HOODS can react.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e walks back to EVE'S CAR, cool as a cucumber, gets in an pulls away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE'S face has turned a distinct shade of PALE GREEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Are they... OK?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV looks at her like she's nuts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV They're dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE is overwhelmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE How can you... how can you do that...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV barely hears her - he's become DISTRACTED, flexing h left hand and feeling around his legs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I told you, baby... I quit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots something, hits the brakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) Wait here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He jumps out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV almost COLLAPSES when his feet hit the ground. It se like the left half of his body has simply stopped working

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Jesus Christ! Now what...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He unsnaps the buttons of the warm-up pants to reveal tha his left leg has TURNED GREY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's HALF DEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (pointing at her) Stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've pulled up across the street from a HARDWARE STORE CHEV drags his carcass across the street, oblivious to th traffic swerving and braking to avoid him, and stumbles i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE stays in the car for a few seconds, looking lost, the pulls herself together and gets out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She follows CHEV'S path, crossing the street through traf

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TORE EMPLOYEES and CUSTOMERS start bailing out of the sto in a PANIC as she approaches the front doors. She walks through them and INSIDE.

dialogues.speaker: INT HARDWARE STORE, SECONDS LATER
dialogues.text: 123 EVE dream-walks through the store, past the registers, following CHEV'S trail of BLOOD-SMEARED FOOTPRINTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pimple-faced STOCK CLERK blows by her, not looking back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STOCK CLERK He's got a gun!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns the corner and there's CHEV - he's propped up i the middle of an aisle in front of a bin of NAILS, HAMMER one hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e's already hammered SIX FRAMING NAILS INTO HIS LEG and i busy POUNDING IN NUMBER SEVEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up at her, eyes wild.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't feel my leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE is speechless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At first CHEV doesn't understand where the SOUND is comin from ... he looks around as if a RED GHOST might glide ar a random corner any second ... then realizes his CELL is his pocket. He answers it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: H ello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chevy! Holy shit, man, I've been trying to reach you for a half hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: INT CHOCOLATE'S APARTMENT, SIMULTANEOUS
dialogues.text: 124 DOC is calling from the broken down apartment we saw earl CHOCOLATE is kicking back on a worn, brown imitation leat sofa in the background, watching TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm at my office. Can you get here?

dialogues.speaker: INT HARDWARE STORE, SIMULTANEOUS
dialogues.text: 125 SIRENS approach outside.      CHEV meets EVE'S eyes, shak head: unbelievable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, why not?

dialogues.speaker: INT CHOCOLATE'S APARTMENT, 9 MINUTES LATER
dialogues.text: 126 An IV bag bubbles, a portable HEART MONITOR beeps. The CAMERA follows the drip down to CHEV'S arm. He's lying on the brown sofa, wheezing thickly. Some kind of Court TV s plays on the tube in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES crouches beside CHEV, examines the heart monito shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV I owe you again, Doc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES You're my best customer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV gesturing with his head at the IV) What is this stuff?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES Synthetic ephedrine, diluted with saline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV It feels sort of good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES Oh, I also gave you a little meth. That's the endorphins rushing into to your brain that you're feeling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV So I'm not... better?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES Fuck no. You're in such shit shape it's stunning. I've never seen a heart take this kind of punishment and keep ticking. You should be in a fucking medical journal or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV So... what are you going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC just shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES The solution I'm giving you is acting as a competitive inhibitor... meaning it pushes the poison out of your receptors and replaces it with a chemical... it's a temporary fix...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Then what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES Look, if we put you on life support we could maybe string you out for a few days, but at some point you'd almost certainly lapse into a coma... and then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now it hits CHEV for the first time: this is really i He seems like he might break down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (cocking his head toward the next room) Does she know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE and CHOCOLATE are sitting cross-legged on the mattres staring blankly at the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (no inflection) I hate television.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHOCOLATE looks sideways at her: the white girl is CRAZY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC shakes his head NO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV broods silently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES f you want, I can load you up with something, you'll go out in a beautiful dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV A dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASH CUT: A RED GHOST, pulsing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES (gently) Can I do that for you, Chev?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV No... no, that's not what I want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES Then ... what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV'S moment of weakness passes. His face goes grim with vengeance as the mean bastard inside him kicks in. He loo DOC MILES in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC MILES regards him blankly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want one hour.

dialogues.speaker: INT HUMVEE LIMOUSINE, DAY
dialogues.text: 127 RICKY VERONA and his CREW are in the back, watching a noi satellite feed on dual plasma TV screens. A JAPANESE GIRL a red blazer, one of the TOURISTS from the bus, is being interviewed in Japanese amidst a crowd of her semi-identi friends. A TRANSLATION is overdubbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GIRLS giggle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA rolls his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me a fucking break...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BROADCAST cuts to a MONTAGE: The trashed restaurant, burning Police motorcycle, the car crashed into the mall escalator, POLICE sifting through wreckage, finally the sketch of CHEV'S face. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 27 And so the wild rampage that began at 9 AM this morning in West Los Angeles continues, with the mysterious suspect still at large.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we shoulda give him more of that Chinese shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: V

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (sarcastic) Oh ... you think?    Jesus ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His cell phone rings.       He checks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (CONT'D) (shaking his head in disbelief) It's him. Alright, shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (CONT'D) What's up, corpse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Hey douchebag, thought you might be interested in a little deal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ERONA A deal?   You're mental, dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I want the antidote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA Oh, the antidote, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA makes eye contact with his CREW, covering the mouthpiece of the phone; they all try to keep from breaki up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV That's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA And what are you prepared to give me. Asshole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV How about the jewelry I got off your faggot brother, you cocksucker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This stings VERONA. He pulls the phone away from his face looks at it like he wants to smash it into bits, then pul himself together and puts it back to his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (holding back, tight lipped) Hmmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Thinking about it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA pantomimes jacking off for the boys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV You like that deal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I'll be at Downtown Standard in twenty minutes. You know the spot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Don't be late, or I'll trade this thing to some whore for a hand job ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (cutting him off) I'll be there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He clicks off, then sits there, seething.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (CONT'D) (to the BOYZ) What the hell are you looking at?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn back toward the plasma screens. VERONA takes a deep breath, then speed dials a number on the cell phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Verona. You're not going to believe the call I just got.

dialogues.speaker: EXT LOS ANGELES, DAY
dialogues.text: 129 MONTAGE TO MUSIC: more of L.A. at 3 f.p.s. - the traffic flowing, trains zapping by, commuters commuting, everythi at a thousand miles an hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (O.C.) It's going to be alright, baby.

dialogues.speaker: EXT LOS ANGELES, DAY
dialogues.text: 130 From a distance, in a locked off TELEPHOTO frame, we see walking toward the CAMERA in slow motion, 100 f.p.s.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dialog from an UNSEEN CONVERSATION is layered over the im

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (O.C.) But... you said...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (O.C.) I know. But things have changed. There's an antidote. I can make a deal for it, but I've got to go alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's well dressed in a sportcoat, slacks, button down shi and tie, flapping in the wind ... sunglasses, and look of brutal determination on his face ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (O.C.) Of course. But you'll be safe now. And I'll be back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a series of dissolves he comes straight at the CAMERA his face fills the frame ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE looks up into CHEV'S eyes, absolutely vulnerable, absolutely STUNNING. Pale sunlight punches through the ha rolled blinds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE Do you promise?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV meets her gaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promise.

dialogues.speaker: EXT STANDARD HOTEL, DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES
dialogues.text: 131 CHEV bangs through the revolving glass doors to the hotel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA shifts to a ROUGH HANDHELD POV, similar to the shot that starts the film. The MUSIC is replaced by the SOUND of CHEV'S labored BREATHING and HEARTBEAT. The POV doubles, goes in and out of focus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: n one continuous shot he approaches the STANDARD HOTEL an walks past the valets into the RETRO-MOD LOBBY.

dialogues.speaker: INT LOBBY, STANDARD HOTEL
dialogues.text: 132 The shot continues as CHEV moves through the LOBBY and ma a beeline for the RESTROOM. Scattered around are hard looking DUDES pretending to read newspapers ... he passes them by, avoiding eye contact.

dialogues.speaker: INT BATHROOM, STANDARD HOTEL
dialogues.text: 33 The bathroom is empty. He walks into a stall, shuts the d and opens his coat - we see a PAGER-SIZED device clipped his belt - a green LED is illuminated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVERSE: CHEV adjusts a tiny knob on the device.   His fac shiny with perspiration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out his shirt tails ... we see that a small tube runs from the device to a needle inserted in the base of

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: spine, taped up with white adhesive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV tucks the shirt back carefully, takes a series of dee breaths and leaves the stall.

dialogues.speaker: INT LOBBY, STANDARD HOTEL
dialogues.text: 134 He bangs open the door to the restroom and pushes past th of the DUDES, who were about to go in. They let him pass, trying to avoid attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV makes his way to the ELEVATORS, hits the UP button. doors open, he gets on. The DUDES watch from the LOBBY.

dialogues.speaker: INT ELEVATOR, STANDARD HOTEL
dialogues.text: 135 A JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN - early 50s, compact and under fiv feet, immaculately groomed - hustles on as the doors slid shut. He stands opposite CHEV against the wall and stares him, expressionless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening, brother?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV takes a small bottle of PILLS from his coat pocket a swallows them dry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He closes his eyes and leans against the wall to steady himself as the effect of the pills washes over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: n UNEXPECTED VOICE breaks the silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KAREN CHELIOS Where did I go wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV'S eyes SNAP OPEN.    The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN stares impassively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (weirded out) Did you say something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN answers - but when he moves lips, it's the voice of A WOMAN IN HER 40s.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KAREN CHELIOS Like talking to the wall... C HEV Mom?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KAREN CHELIOS I'm amazed you remember you have a mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV shakes his head in disbelief, tries to clear his eye but the HALLUCINATION persists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KAREN CHELIOS (CONT'D) You never call, you never write... I haven't seen you since you ran out at

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (falling right into it) Right, with you popping Valium like Tic Tacs and balling some new asshole every two weeks... why wouldn't I stick around for entertainment like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KAREN CHELIOS That's hurtful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV is an instant ball of regret.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: O

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (exasperated) Mom, I got no time for this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN cuts him off - this time the voi is ORLANDO'S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ORLANDO You got no time, period.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Orlando?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RLANDO ou a persistent motherfucker, Chev Chelios, I'll give you that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (reacting) This is weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ORLANDO But you know this has got to stop sometime. What do you think you are, Michael Myers? They pop you and you just keep gettin up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV I'm the Terminator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN does another transformation - th time into ALEX.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALEX You was that, maybe. But there's a new gun in town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Don't tell me you're talking about your bro, Def Lepard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALEX He did you pretty good, didn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Yeah, not so much. I don't get it - why didn't you guys just cut me up alive when you had the chance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALEX Verona said you was Chev Chelios - A.K.A. Death On Two Legs. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He said you probably been a contract killer since grade school.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: s he speaks, ALEX'S voice transforms again, this time int CHEV'S... he's now talking to A MIRROR OF HIMSELF...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRROR CHEV Bipolar. Sadomasochistic tendencies. Adrenaline junkie. Addicted to violence... probably spends every day of his life looking for the big thrill, the big rush. Cutting up a guy like that while he screams in his own blood and excrement would be like... like a GIFT... a warrior's death... hell, you'd probably get off on it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV Did you rehearse this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRROR CHEV No, this was the best way for a guy like you: a slow, ticking clock... winding down... inevitable... non-negotiable... until...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (cutting him off) Who the hell are you, anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRROR CHEV Don't you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (soberly) I think I'm starting to figure it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MIRROR CHEV Yeah, well, better late than never. (conversational) You know you're going to die up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (cold) Yeah, maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he CAMERA holds CHEV'S gaze for a long moment, unflinchin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) But I'm taking you with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVERSE, CU: The JAPANESE BUSINESSMAN has TRANSFORMED INT GIANT BLUE GHOST, pulsing silently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO: wide angle TWO SHOT, CHEV and the flat, two dimensional, computer animated GHOST, facing each other a opposite ends of the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOUND: the CHIME SOUNDS, signalling they've reached the t floor.

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: HEV glances at the lit floor number display, then back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JAPANESE MAN stares back at him, blank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (CONT'D) (under his breath) Some pills, Doc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The JAPANESE MAN ignores him. When the doors open, he hustles off ... past two GOONS, who are waiting there for CHEV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They each take an arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This way.

dialogues.speaker: INT RESTAURANT, STANDARD HOTEL
dialogues.text: 136 The GOONS lead CHEV through a posh dining area, down a da corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They frisk him, finding the obvious .45 in the shoulder holster, yank it out and push him into a SMOKING LOUNGE.

dialogues.speaker: INT SMOKING LOUNGE, STANDARD HOTEL
dialogues.text: 137 CARLITO and RICKY VERONA sit side by side at the table. A iced bucket of champagne, good cigars. GOONS chill in the corners. The whole floor has been cleared out - they've g the place all to themselves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smug) What's up, dead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Looks like everyone's here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO (chuckling despite himself) Chelios... what a fucking mess you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV No shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO Why don't you sit down?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA Wait a minute. gesturing to the GOONS by the door) Pat him down again. He's carrying something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GOONS give him another look. This time they reach dow his pants and produce a second small, concealed handgun . then discover the pager-like device. One of the goons rip the tube from CHEV's back - CHEV winces in pain. His HEARTRATE starts to slow almost immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO Let me see that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GOON tosses it to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO (CONT'D) Clever ... what is this, an insulin pump?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Basically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA What the fuck is insulin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO shuts him up with a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO (holding the device up) Ephedrine, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV nods. CARLITO places the device carefully on the tab

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO (CONT'D) (bemused) Very resourceful ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e reaches into his coat pocket, produces a pair of black leather gloves and starts to put them on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV to Verona) Found a new master, you little bitch, is that it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA I'm nobody's little bitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (egging him on) We'll see what kind of a bitch you are when Carlito hires you for half what he used to pay me... and you take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO That's enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV You'll probably throw boss a nice little reach-around just to show what a good bitch you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA I'm nobody's little bitch, you hear me? He'll pay what I tell him to pay...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO I said that's enough. (calmly) It's been a long day. But in the end, you must agree, it all works out quite nicely. Don Kim gets his bullet, thanks to you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO unlatches a 2'x6" beautifully crafted mahogany wo case sitting on the table in front of him. It contains several SYRINGES and bottle of MILKY FLUID. He removes on SYRINGE from the box with a gloved hand. It almost glows the soft light.      C ARLITO (CONT'D) ... and Hong Kong gets a goat to take the fall. Please understand, Chev, it's truly nothing personal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA Speak for yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO squirts a little of the MILKY LIQUID.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Is that what I think it is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO The Chinese shit. (nods to the GOONS) Hold him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a flash, CHEV WHIPS OUT A GUN - everyone FLINCHES... b no, wait: he's just holding out his fist, pointing the ST EM-UP FINGER right between CARLITO'S eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Not so fast, motherfucker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a beat, no one knows quite how to react. VERONA chuck nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA Dude's gone dipsy doodle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV whips the finger toward VERONA, shutting him down mi word. VERONA shrugs it off with less than 100% confidence the room EXHALES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (CONT'D) Whatever, psycho...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO I'm afraid the Houdini act is over, Chelios.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GOON makes a move for CHEV... but CHEV spins on him, leveling the finger at the GOON'S forehead, and pulls the "trigger"...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (imitating a gunshot) Booosh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GOON'S head is rocked back, a NICKEL-SIZED HOLE poppe right through the cranium... a GLORIOUS FOUNTAIN OF CRIMS arcs from the GOON'S forehead across the table, splashing into the ice bucket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA (freaking) Ourfather whoartinheaven hallowedbethy -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO Shut up, Verona.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM So this is how it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone turns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM,   in a Ralph Lauren polo shirt and white slacks, standing   at the entrance of the bar. He's got an ASIAN GANGSTER   on each side, one of them holding out a smokin silenced   GLOCK .9mm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More ASIAN GANGSTERS appear all around, moving in, taking position. The GANGSTERS all look about 16 years old, dres for a hot night at the FLORENTINE GARDENS... but their ey are dead-blank COLD AS HELL. V ERONA What... you... he...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Presto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of CARLITO'S GOONS points an UZI at DON KIM... and is FILLED FULL OF LEAD in the blink of an eye by a pair of ASIANS on his blind side... who are CUT TO RIBBONS by ano of CARLITO'S MEN... and ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO scrambles away from the table and grabs one of hi GOONS, using him as a shield as he makes his way behind t bar... the GOON absorbs a hail of bullets...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA whips out a .357 MAGNUM, turns toward CHEV...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ummoning a surge of strength from out of his ass, CHEV ki the table forward, pinning VERONA'S legs to the bench - t ICE BUCKET slides into CHEV'S lap...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: e snatches out a bottle of Dom Perignon and fastballs it VERONA'S GUN HAND... the bottle SHATTERS... VERONA bobble the .357... it hits the ground - GOES OFF - and the four fingers of VERONA'S right hand are VAPORIZED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA SHRIEKS like a ten year old girl at a JUSTIN TIMBERLAKE concert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the bar, CARLITO quickly punches up his cell phone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO Get me out of here! NOW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PILOT is standing by in CARLITO'S personal HELICOPTER, waiting on the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PILOT Yes sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He fires her up, LIFTS OFF...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO'S and DON KIM'S MEN have backed into opposite cor of the room, and are firing back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA crawls along the floor, gathering up what's left o his fingers... comes across a SYRINGE and grabs it in his teeth like a PIRATE'S KNIFE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM stands amidst the chaos, completely unperturbed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO (from behind the bar) I'll kill you for this, Chelios!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV Too late!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV swoons, almost passes out... catches sight of a GUN pries it from the hand of a dead GOON... he spots VERONA' FEET disappearing behind a wall, takes a bead and fires - blowing off a set of toes to go with the fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ASIAN GANGSTER runs up and lobs a GRENADE behind the BAR... it bounces along and comes to rest next to CARLITO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO thinks quick, grabbing one of his GOONS - a 265 pounder - from behind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO Get down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He BODY-TACKLES the BIG MAN onto the floor, right on top the live grenade, and brings his weight down on top of hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GOON Thanks, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BIG GOON'S body absorbs the blast, which picks them b up five feet in the air... CARLITO, momentarily airborne, pops up from behind the bar like a JACK IN THE BOX, then drops back down with a THUD...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO Ronnie James Dio...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LOUNGE opens into a daylight drenched POOL AREA... CARLITO'S HELICOPTER drops down into view, roiling up the water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO makes a break for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no you don't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV goes after him, spinning and careening across the sl floor like a CHARLIE CHAPLIN DRUNK ACT, dodging bullets a blasting away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police have surrounded the hotel and are pouring into the Lobby in teams. Squad cars, CHERRY TOPS FLASHING, SWAT va pulled up on to the curb, people roped off, crowd control news vans, the works.

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: TV REPORTER is sending a live feed amidst the pandemonium

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police have moved to surround the Downtown Standard Hotel, where the suspect ... the unidentified madman ... is believed to be holed up and making a desperate last stand ...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 145 CHEV staggers out into the daylight as the windows to the restaurant shatter - and is met by a SWIRLING RUSH OF WIN the HELICOPTER attempts to set down amidst the chaise lou and futuristic plastic cabanas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CARLITO is climbing in as CHEV clambers up and GRABS HIM BEHIND. CARLITO spins; CHEV shoves the gun in his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Present from Kaylo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But just as he's about to pull the trigger, he FREEZES... face TWITCHING... knees BUCKLING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and we see that VERONA has come up behind him and JAM THE SYRINGE RIGHT TO THE HILT INTO THE BACK OF HIS NECK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV drops to his knees.    His HEARTBEAT is deafening, GLACIAL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a bloodthirsty rage) Now what? Now say shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shaken for once) Jesus, man, where the fuck where you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA grabs the gun out of CHEV'S hand and points it at CARLITO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHO'S THE BITCH NOW?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He blows CARLITO away with three shots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PILOT starts to lift off in a blue panic. VERONA shov CHEV aside and hops into the back seat, pointing his gun the PILOT'S head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right, motherfucker!   FLY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA whips the gun around as the bird rises, intending . finish CHEV off from the air ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .. and has the gun removed from his hand by CHEV, who has climbed onto the landing skids, hooking his dead arm insi the passenger space, going up with them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DON KIM watches the HELICOPTER rise as his MEN finish off last of CARLITO'S GOONS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do not use a hatchet to remove a fly from your friend's forehead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GANGSTER gives him a sidelong look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (explaining) Confucius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... the DOOR BUSTS IN and the place is crawling with S.W.

dialogues.speaker: EXT THE SKY ABOVE LOS ANGELES, SECONDS LATER
dialogues.text: 146 CHEV'S HEARTBEAT IS SLAMMING as the bird rises high above rooftop and the surrounding streets. He wrestles his way into the back seat as VERONA tries desperately to push hi out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NEWS HELICOPTERS hover around the midair struggle like wa shooting across at the action.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIVE TELEVISION BROADCAST: An announcer babbles over 147 phenomenal live video of CHEV and VERONA struggling in th helicopter.

dialogues.speaker: EXT THE SKY ABOVE LOS ANGELES, SIMULTANEOUS
dialogues.text: 148 CHEV has VERONA locked up; both men are fighting with jus one hand ... VERONA manages to work his up to CHEV'S shoulder, where the steel needle still pokes through. He slides it out and stabs at CHEV'S face ... CHEV catches h wrist in time to hold him off, but his grip is slipping .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spaces between CHEV'S HEARTBEATS have grown longer an longer ... he's obviously having a massive coronary ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dead, you're dead, you're dead!

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: HEV swoons; his eyes roll back in his head ... he starts go limp, fall backwards ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, with a final rush of adrenaline, he grabs VERONA by neck and pulls him along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two men FALL FROM THE HELICOPTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV continues to strangle VERONA in midair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you I'd kill you, you son of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VERONA'S eyes bulge in disbelief. CHEV continues to stran him until VERONA goes limp, glassy eyed ... CHEV finally go ... VERONA'S body drifts away ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now he's alone, free falling ... it's almost peaceful up here.

dialogues.speaker: EXT THE SKY ABOVE LOS ANGELES
dialogues.text: 49 It occurs to him he still has his cell phone. He retrieve it from his coat pocket and clicks a speed dial.

dialogues.speaker: INT EVE'S APARTMENT, SAME TIME
dialogues.text: 150 SLOW ZOOM in on EVE'S answering machine as he talks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVE (O.S.) ... leave a message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEV (O.S.) Hey doll. Looks like I let you down again. You were right about me ... funny, you really have time to reflect on things when you know you're going to die ... seems like all my life I've just been going, going, going ... I wish I'd taken more time to stop and smell the roses, so to speak, but well, I guess it's too late now... you were the greatest, baby.

dialogues.speaker: EXT STREET, IN FRONT OF HIGHRISE, 1 SECOND LATER
dialogues.text: 151 Still frame of a city street, traffic sounds - CAMERA dow the ground. A homeless guy ambles along, looks up, hustle his ass out of the way ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ERONA hits the ground - SMACK! - BOUNCES, flies out of frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next is CHEV - he SLAMS off the canvas top of a moving convertible car - BAM!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEV flies high out of frame, then comes down hard, smashi into a NEWS STAND right in front of the CAMERA ... TRADES FISH WRAPS rain over CHEV and the surrounding area... on a different HEADLINE... "Bo Sox Break The Curse"... "Bush Swiss: You're Next"... etc.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The screen CUTS TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat of silence... is that it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: then -
